tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_imagery_data (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    capture_date DATE,
    satellite_vendor VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE satellite_imagery_data (
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    image_date DATE NOT NULL,
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    satellite_provider TEXT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (image_id)
)

CREATE TABLE soil_health_data (
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    sample_date DATE NOT NULL,
    ph_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    nutrient_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    soil_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (sample_id)
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id INT NOT NULL,
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    analysis_date DATE NOT NULL,
    prediction_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (result_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_imagery_data(image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES soil_health_data(sample_id)
)

CREATE TABLE SatelliteImageryData (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    capture_date DATE,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(100),
    image_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE SoilHealthData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    sample_date DATE,
    ph_level FLOAT,
    nutrient_level FLOAT,
    moisture_level FLOAT
);
